content: *santorini s colorways sing along the matte and shiny textures inherent in the yarn adding vibrant color to warm-weather garments wraps and scarves * ------------------------------------------------------------------- **skill level** intermediate **finished measurements** approx 19½ across top edge and 13½ deep from point to center of top edge **yarn** santorini by classic elite yarns 58% viscose 42% cotton 50 g = approx 125 yards 1 ball 2154 dream **needles** knitting needles in size us6 4 mm or size to obtain gauge for optional i-cord closure two dpn in same size **gauge** 20 sts and 24 row = 4 in stockinette stitch blocked take time to save time check your gauge
